item.description:
The Agenda so far

Customer Development 101
- We received many requests to walk through the basics of Lean Startups and Customer Development. So that's what we'll do. We'll discuss the perspectives of Steve Blank, Eric Ries and Dave McClure as a backdrop for learning what the Lean Startup is all about.

Case Study
The Pinyadda Team
The team from Pinyadda will share their approach to building a lean startup.

BONUS
If you're interested in helping with the LSC Boston meetup group, John Prendergast will be buying beer at a local watering hole and planning our next meetup. Please join us after the regular meeting.
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the Hangout Hub Startup space
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston March Meetup
